title: Attaching email messages to new outgoing email messages.
content:
I need to send emails from my Thunderbird email client to recipients but in that email also attach other emails messages that I have received that may or may not have arrived into the same email account inbox folder as the one from which I am sending.

Another way of asking the same question is that I want to attach email messages or copy and paste them, from one location into my outgoing email message? Is this possible in Thunderbird?

In Outlook, I can simply copy the relevant email that I want to send on and then paste that into the outgoing email message; is the same possible in Thunderbird? I am using 115.7.0 (64-bit)
creator: davidmccorquodale

title: cannot send emails. I get outgoing error 20
content: I do I eliminate error20?
creator: walterjuneau740

title: Not all emails are showing in inbox
content:
Hi, I installed the latest Thunderbird on OS X Monterey for a friend and am using an Imap email account. Sending and receiving emails is working correctly. The problem is viewing what is in the inbox, it shows a certain number in the inbox but not all of those messages are showing up, some are missing. I've played around with the settings but I didn't see anythng that could help me out. On my own computer this works correctly, when I see a number in the inbox, it does show all of those email messages. Not sure what is going on, maybe it's simple like a setting not done correctly, or I missed something. Anyway, any help would be appreciated.

Thanks
creator: t51

title: Cannot connect to Spectrum outgoing server
content: Suddenly, I cannot send mail via Thunderbird. Settings are defaults, security is set to minimum, and I'm getting timed out errors from the outgoing server. Same issue with two different Macs (Mini and MB Air), both running Mac OS Sonoma. Changing ports has no effect. Can send mail from the same Spectrum account via my iPhone, and Spectrum's webmail works fine, so the problem seems to be a new incompatibility of Spectrum with either Thunderbird or Mac OS.
creator: jpdemers1

title: Can I change the background colour of unread messages in list?
content: If I mark a message as Unread, it appears in the list of messages in boldface type. But I am finding it very hard to distinguish those in bold from other messages that have been read and are not bold. Is there anything in advanced settings that would allow me to change the fill colour in the listing box, or perhaps the colour of the type, in order to distinguish unread messages more visibly from those I have read? Thanks!
creator: clivechafer

title: Connicting Bluebird to my gmail account
content:
I have installed the latest version of Bluebird. All address books are there. Calendar events did not migrate, but the Calendar is there. Everything seems normal, however I cannot get mail messages from gmail, and when I try to Send an email generated in Bluebird, I get an authentication error [no valid certificate], and I cannot create an exception. Less often, I am asked for my gmail password, which is not recognized when I type it in.

If anyone has had to deal with this, and found a solution, I sure would love to fix this. I have been using Bluebird for 25 years. I hate the idea that I might have to give it up. My eMail address is: ejcclare@gmail.com.

Thanks.
creator: ejcclare

title: Default sending mail setting keeps changing to a Gmail mail account.
content: For many months now when sending mail the Default sending address keeps changing to another Gmail mail account I have. I have 5Email accounts set up and use the unified folder tab to view. Yet when i send a mail the mail sender is ignored , the default sending mail account setting is ignored and it applies a Gmail account. When i delete the Gmail account it ignores all mails. All help so far does nt address the reason why the default mail setting is overridden.Any help much appreciated.
creator: mgcm10

Just installed Thunderbird. Little Snitch (on Mac) alerted me to allow/deny a connection to location.services.mozilla.com

Why is it doing so?

title: PROBLEMA COM GMAIL NO THUNDERBIRD

Estou com problema quando envio os arquivos com extensão mbox para o gmail Aparece esse erro: Expirou o tempo de conexão ao servidor imap.gmail.com

creator: eustaquio.camarada

title: User interface
content:
The user interface is really confusing. There is a X right on top which closes Thunderbird. In the statusbanner every mail occurs with the title and an X to remove it from the banner.

Until that point no problem.

But I keep my archive on my NAS server as .eml files. When I open one of them they do't appear in the opened Thunderbird, but in e new window with the X for closing ricght in the top..

So when I am reading my new e-mails and want to open an old one it is in a new window with the close X right on top. Moving around between new and archived mails is confusing. The new mails mus be closed on the banner and the archived mails right on the top. Which means that during working like that I close Thunderbird itself many times, have to restart the profile again etc. Not very speed improving.

I see two options: First: open arhived e-mail not as an extra window but within the mail screen second: make it possible to point to a local map within "local maps", or make it possible to archive in local maps outside Thinderbird, hence in any local map on my computer (or NAS server) Then the user interface with a banner for opened e-mails is similar for archived mail and new ones.
creator: firefox@vangelder.nl

title: An error occurred during a connection to localhost
content:
TB was working fine, but now I can no longer send email. I get a popup window with this:

Unable to connect

An error occurred during a connection to localhost. 

   The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.    If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection.    If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Thunderbird is permitted to access the web.

The service (Comcast) is up & working. I've double-checked the password. I've tried disabling my firewall.

How do I figure out what is now causing the problem?
creator: alecramsay

title: How to automatically delete trash after X days on POP account
content: I would like to delete emails in my trash folder automatically after 30 days in the trash bin. I uses POP account settings. I can only find a setting that deletes the trash on exit, but that is too quick. I need more time to recover email from the trash in case I am later alerted to the fact that something I thought was trash turns out to be important. Usually a week or two will suffice. After 30 days, it's a pretty safe bet that anything in the trash is actually trash, so then I want to delete it automatically. Seems like there must be a setting for this somewhere. Anyone know if there is one? If not, how do we request that it be added as an option? Thanks.
creator: ppriu

title: email
content: If I have a new email address will my existing address book still stay on Thunderbird?
creator: brionyhancock

title: MX records
content: Hi, i transfered a domain to another domain provider and i need my MX records and priority so i can connect Thunderbird e mail provider to my domain. Let me know if u need more information, thanks.
creator: lukaluxi321

title: Global Search IGNORING search terms (Supernova and prev Thunderbird versions)
content:
Whenever I search a two-letter or two-character search it immediately says "no messages match your search".

For example: Searching of or "of" returns "no messages match your search"

Searching of of of or "of of" returns "no messages match your search"

Searching of the or "of the" returns results for "the" only.

Also ignores "." and ":" e.g. ignores "of."

Probably there are other things/combinations it ignores

Is there any way to correct this e.g. via config editor or via add-on or otherwise?
creator: lookingtolearn

title: The way some messages are displaying
content:
I just updated to 115.8.0. I have a much older mac without the upgrade and it is not having the same problem as my os 12.6.3 mac. Some of my inbound emails from are being taken over by a particular email from another sender so the message displays as the other sender, as does the from and reply to, but the subject retains the info from the original sender. Three or four emails in a row will all look like the other sender. The other sender was a public radio station. What's going on?

For example, the email displayed below is from one of my vendors, and has a simple message saying Thanks. The subjct line referencing a quote is correct. The rest is not.
creator: carol68

title: Disabled Sort By From Option
content: I am a totally blind user and I really need the View > Sort By > From menu option in Thunderbird 115 to be changed from disabled to enabled. I am strictly a keyboard user and I can't find instructions to do this that don't involve using a mouse. Can someone please provide instructions on how to activate this sort option using only the keyboard? It is possible, once I have the keyboard focus on the right place, for me to emulate mouse clicks using the keyboard with my JAWS 2024 version screen reader. I've been banging my head on my desk in frustration over this for some time now. Changing this menu option did not make Thunderbird easier to use, especially for blind users. Changes like this have the opposite impact on accessibility. Otherwise, I love this program!
creator: Duane.S.Farrar

content: I would like to know if I can set up separate folders with subject headings into which I can move and store emails, so that I can easily access all emails relating to a particular subject by opening the folder relating to that subject.

title: Gmail authentication fails unless I use debug mode, even when I've cleaned out addons etc.
content:
Gmail authentication fails unless I use debug mode, even when I've cleaned out addons etc.

Gmail then asks for permissions via Thunderbird menu and (sometimes) via 2F text to phone. I always grant these but authentication will always fail unless I start in debug mode.

Note: this is IMAP access.

Also, I read that master password is broken. Is this a related bug?

Thanks in advance.
creator: firefox2724

title: Can't send e-mails on Thunderbird 115.8.0
content:
Am in the UK. I am able to receive e-mails, but not able to send e-mails. All was well until relatively recently. The following message appears: Sending of the message failed. Unable to authenticate to Outgoing server (SMTP) mail.uwclub.net. Please check the password and verify the 'Authentication method' in 'Account Settings | Outgoing server (SMTP)'.

I gave gone through all suggestions I can find online, (including the "Cannot send messages" support page here) but still no success.

Mail provider: uwclub.net ISP: BT Firewall: off (Mac) Antivirus: Avast Security Operating system: Mac OS Sonoma 14.2.1 Thunderbird 115.8.0

I can still send e-mails from my account using the mail provider webmail facility (but not through Thunderbird.

Any help would be appreciated.
creator: dcharles2

title: recieve email from Karspersky to renew my password
content:
Dear customer,

Thank you for getting in touch.

You may refer to the attached file.

You may contact email support for the email system to find out why the email was not delivered to your mailbox

Thank you and have a nice day! Regards Manz | Customer Service Representative


If the suggested solution did not help or you need more information, you can simply reply to this e-mail leaving the subject line unchanged. If you have no further questions and the issue is in fact resolved, then you can simply ignore this message, and we will close this request for you within 15 days.

We have obtained your personal data from you directly. The provided data will only be used for the provision of technical support and will be processed and protected in accordance with Kaspersky Data Privacy Statement for technical support for Africa, Australia, Canada, Denmark, Middle East, New Zealand, EU, and other countries, United Kingdom, United States of America

Should you have any questions about Kaspersky privacy practices or if you would like us to update information or preferences you provided to us, please contact our Data Protection Officer.

AO Kaspersky Lab, bldg. 3, 39A, Leningradskoe Shosse, Moscow, 125212, Russian Federation. The representative of AO Kaspersky Lab in EU is Kaspersky Labs GmbH, Despag-Str. 3, 85055 Ingolstadt, Germany.

Quando invece invio un messaggio, Thunderbird lo invia ma non lo salva in posta in posta inviata. Non ho fatto aggiornamenti ed uso Windows 10 e Thunderbird a 32 bit (quello a 64 bit non posso usarlo perchè non si interfaccerebbe con il software gestionale che uso che richiede un programma predefinito di posta a 32 bit Anche in modalità risoluzione problemi non cambia nulla. title: Locking up after adding new online calendar
content:
Using version 115.

After adding an online calendar (Remember the Milk task manager/todo list), Thunderbird locks up. Nothing works. I've uninstalled/reinstalled the app with no solution to the problem. Windows' Task Manager shows Thunderbird using an awful lot of CPU resources and the amount does not seem to decrease, even if I leave everything alone. I don't know if this is one of those Lightning bugs I've read about but, whatever it is, Thunderbird is useless to me now. Suggestions?

title: Signature setting with logo + QR code images, text with chosen font, and URL hyperlinks
content:
What should be SO simple (drag n drop simple..) is ridiculously complicated to do. :( :( :( (OTW I'm just daft and I can't see something that may be right in front of me...) :P. I hope it, at least, CAN be done...

      • Please see screenshot from my Apple Mail's signature. That is exactly what I want to create in Thunderbird for my signature!! (2 images for logo and for QR code, Text in the font I want, Hyperlinks for URL contact info)


1) I want to create a simple signature that starts off with text (in the font I want..), eg:

Sincerely,

John Doe, Operations director


2) then below this, an image of my logo (jpeg or png)


3) then, underneath this image, my contact details (the URL's as clickable HYPERLINKS), eg:

C: +41 191 1818 18181 E: john@hello-how-are-you.ch U: www.hello-how-are-you.ch S: www.instagram.com/hellohowareyou.switzerland/


4) then, underneath this info, a second image with my QR code


      • In Gmail, and even in the Apple Mail app, you just type everything the way you want it (position, font, font size, colors etc), drag the images wherever you want them to be, and BOOM YOU'RE READY!

Can someone PLEASE tell me how to quickly do the above in thunderbird because I am completely frustrated!!
creator: henrybiquet

title: Email help with new laptop
content:
Hi,

I just got a new laptop and installed Thunderbird, which I've had for years. Tons of contacts, using two email addresses. One is with Spectrum and the other is through Bluehost (my website).

I was able to figure out how to download the emails from Spectrum, but when I click on email, I get empty box, no details within the email. What happened?

Also, I don't have any contacts. Where did all my contacts go?

Please help. Email is my lifeblood with work. I'm also self-employed, so no technical help from employer.

Thanks so much, Patti P.S. Would love to speak to a human if at all possible. This is so challenging for me.
